author: Jessica Bursztynsky
title: Bill Gates calls Trump's decision to halt funding for WHO 'as dangerous as it sounds'
description: Bill Gates said the White House should not withhold funding for the World Health Organization during a global pandemic, a day after the president announced his intent to do so while the U.S. reviews the agency's response to Covid-19.
content: Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates said the White House should not withhold funding from the World Health Organization during a global pandemic, hours after President Donald Trump announced his intent to do so while the U.S. reviews the agency's response to Covi… [+2293 chars]
